title: FedEx Meets Low Expectations
itunes:title: FedEx Meets Low Expectations
description:
Bloomberg Intelligence Senior Transportation Analyst Lee Klaskow breaks down earnings from FedEx. He explains that weaker economic demand and higher costs are weighing on the company.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
